sp.list: Valid SP issued at one (1) month and one (1) day from date of application
sp.label: Student's Permit

birth.list: Scan of birth certificate duly authenticated by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA)
birth.label: Birth Certificate

pass.list: Scan of Passport with entry of at least one (1) month and visa duration of at least one (1) year from date of application
pass.label: Passport

drive.list: Scan of Foreign Driver's License (or official English translation from the Embassy of the issuing country
drive.label: Driver's License (English)
